Yeah, in our case, the pain point is when we are ahead of the released tests, and need to selectively disable tests in our CI until we have an updated release of consensus-spec-test.

But when we have something as big as my recent PR (changing beacon state, etc), we need to basically disable all Electra tests until a new release comes out.

I am thinking about hosting a version I built locally to make it available for our CI, but having an "official" nightly would be very nice ðŸ™‚
